PositionHistory.Description: Ecommerce Webshop for a leading tire manufacturing company and one of the world's top 5 tire manufacturing companies. Webchannel is integrated with SAP Portal and is implemented for B2B scenarios.

PositionHistory.Title: Lead Java Developer
Senior Java Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Retail Shared Infrastructure (RSI)
Customer Assist (CA) is the primary application used to service bank customers and accounts. It provides a complete view of the customer's relationship with bank including a list of the accounts owned by the customer and a history of the customer's contacts with bank. Customer Assist is a multi-channel platform used by bankers in branches, call centers, and various back office support sites.

PositionHistory.Title: Software Developer

CompetencyEvidence.StringValue: 8 years of IT experience in Java

CompetencyEvidence.StringValue: Object Oriented Analysis and Design and Object Oriented Programming

Competency.name: performance analysis of the application and fixed problems
Sun Certified Programmer for the Java Platform

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 7 years. Currently this candidate is employed as a Java/J2EE developer at Fidelity Information Services. This candidate has extensive knowledge of Java, Struts Web Application Framework, JavaScript, Java Server Pages, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, XML, Spring Framework, Java Servlets, JDBC, IBM WebSphere, Hibernate, HTML, Enterprise Java Beans, SOAP, Cascading Style Sheets, AJAX, JUnit, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, WSDL, Rapid Application Development RAD, MVC, Log4j, JavaServer Faces, ECLiPSe, Data Access Object, Web Services, Oracle 9i, Oracle, Object Oriented Analysis/Design, DHTML, Apache Wicket, XHTML, WebSphere Studio Application Developer, XML Schema, Spring Web Flow, SAP SAP Portal, SAP IS, PeopleSoft, PATTERN, Microsoft Exchange Server, MC, Apache Axis. So far this candidate has not gained any managerial experience.
